# **Dr. M. Clarke Miller Ph.D., MBA, M.Ed.**

Clarke is an Associate Professor of Biochemistry at the University of North Georgia. Clarke holds a Ph.D. in Biochemistry from the University of Kentucky, an MBA from Oglethorpe University, and a MEd in Instructional Design and Development from the University of Georgia. After earning his Ph.D., he spent nearly a decade as a researcher at the Brown Cancer Center before accepting a position in the Department of Chemistry and Biochemistry at the University of North Georgia in 2014. Clarke is currently a student at the University of Georgia and in the process of completing a M.S. in Epidemiology and Biostatistics.
